name: 1 Minute till Midnight
description:
1 Minute to midnight is a puzzle murder mystery type game with the limitation of having only 3 button inputs for gameplay. This limitation was set for the MiniJam 44: New Year Gamejam where entries were given 72 hours to complete a game from scratch.

Note: The game is not finished and the end of the playable portion is over once you have experienced two conversations from everyone.. More planned to come.

Coding: Fmlad 
Art/Animations: Fmlad 
Sfx: Freesound 

Audio:
